data.title: Michael Harris - 2022 - Football
data.meta_description:
Michael Harris (73) DT  - Earning Their Stripes Video (YouTube)

2022: Fifth-year team member ... first-year team captain ... selected as one of 156 semifinalists
data.text:
Earning Their Stripes Video (YouTube)

2022: Fifth-year team member ... first-year team captain ... selected as one of 156 semifinalists for the prestigious William V. Campbell Trophy®, awarded to the nation’s top football scholar-athlete by the National Football Foundation (NFF) & College Hall of Fame ... returning starter at defensive tackle ... has started 20 of 24 career games ... has 72 total career tackles, including 24 solo and 48 assists, six career tackles for loss and 0.5 career sacks ... All-ODAC (2021) ... two-time ODAC All-Academic Team (2019-20, 2020-21).

2021: Second Team All-ODAC ... started all 10 games as a senior … had 29 total tackles, including four solo and 25 assists, and 1.5 tackles for loss.

2020 (Spring 2021): Started three of five games as a junior … had 16 total tackles, including five solo and 11 assists, and three tackles for loss ... ODAC All-Academic Team.

2019: Did not play in a game as a sophomore due to injury ... ODAC All-Academic Team.

2018: Started seven of nine games as a freshman … had 27 total tackles, including 15 solo and 12 assists, 1.5 tackles for loss and 0.5 sacks.

High School: 2018 graduate of Patrick Henry High School in Ashland … earned All-Region and All-District honors … Senior Honors Choir … three-time All-District Chorus … two-time Best Actor Award … member of theater, choir and show choir.

Personal: Son of Michael Harris and Rabah Penn … has three sisters (Gabriel, Imani, Sophia) … father played football at Shaw (N.C.) University … majoring in theatre with a minor in music … favorite TV show is South Park … favorite movie is Avatar … favorite professional sports team is the New York Giants … favorite sports figures include Aaron Donald and J.J. Watt … greatest sports moment was helping defense force a fumble at the two-yard line with just over a minute remaining at W&L for the win … hobbies include theater and music.
